value.title: The Pentagon’s $1 Million Question: Can AI Predict An Enemy’s Emotions?
value.excerpt: The science of using AI to detect and predict emotions is shaky but the U.S. military and a handful of well-funded startups are hoping to prove the doubters wrong, whatever the risks.

value.title: Japanese robot to clock in at a convenience store in test of retail automation
value.excerpt: In August, a robot vaguely resembling a kangaroo will begin stacking sandwiches, drinks and ready meals on shelves at a Japanese convenience store in a test its maker, Telexistence, hopes will help trigger a wave of retail automation.

value.title: German Court Says Tesla Self-Driving Claims Are Misleading
